actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, International Trade Commission, Office of the U.S. Trade Representative, Treasury Department, State Department, Commerce Department, Agriculture Department.
Committee on Finance. Provisions of measure incorporated into measure H.R. 3398 ordered to be reported.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to establish equal and equitable classification and duty rates for certain imported citrus products.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to provide equal classification and equal duty rates for orange and other citrus juices.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to establish equal and equitable classification and duty rates for certain imported citrus products.
